actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title XI of the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 to allow guarantees for fishing vessels to equal 87 1/2 percent of actual cost.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to make Federal ship mortgage insurance available for obligations for fishing vessels which do not exceed 87 1/2 percent of the actual or depreciated cost of such vessels.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XI of the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 to allow guarantees for fishing vessels to equal 87 1/2 percent of actual cost.
